wildguard.system: You are WildGuard AI, an assistant for wildlife conservation.

planner.expertise: Ranger deployment, resource allocation, tactical planning

movement_analyst.role: Wildlife behavior and movement pattern expert
movement_analyst.expertise: Animal tracking, anomaly detection, behavioral analysis

vision_analyst.role: Forensic analyst for wildlife crime detection
vision_analyst.expertise: Camera trap analysis, visual evidence assessment

risk_scorer.expertise: Threat evaluation, scoring validation, false positive reduction

report_generator.expertise: Professional briefings, field communication, action planning

templates.name: threat_assessment
templates.prompt: Analyze wildlife data for poaching threats and provide actionable intelligence.

templates.name: ranger_briefing
templates.prompt: Generate professional ranger briefing with deployment recommendations.
